content:
I thought what he said made sense,
so I gave him the fishing rod.
But now that I think about it, something feels off...
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持鱼竿闲聊（日常）-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
Then a merchant pulled out a huge crate of fish,
wanting to trade it for my fishing rod,
"Isn't getting fish what you're after anyway?"
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持鱼竿闲聊（日常）-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
Seeing that fishing rod in your hands,
It reminds me of a rumor in Amber...
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持鱼竿闲聊（日常）-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊
闲聊-关于玩家手持鱼竿闲聊（日常）-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
You're wandering around with your fishing rod again,
Could it be that you really love eating fish?
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持鱼竿闲聊（日常）-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
For me, there are only a few types of fish:
The ones that taste good, the ones that don't,
And the ones that look toxic enough to knock out several people.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持鱼竿闲聊（日常）-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊

content:
Seeing your fishing rod,
It reminds me of that jewel-encrusted one I made,
The plan was to dazzle the fish before reeling them in.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持鱼竿闲聊（日常）-1008热贝尔_单一闲聊
